turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I I want to book a coffee in Starbucks, espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, you're looking to order a coffee at starbucks, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I get you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry, what type of coffee did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want Starbucks coffee-type.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, starbucks sells a lot of different coffees, which one did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want whipped cream.
